Created an attachment (id=61298)
Removes status handler tests from the dynamic tests suite

Patch released for build >20070119-1300.

We should get to the bottom of this in M7.

The problem appears to be using two calls to LeakTests.checkRef in one method.  checkRef will pop references off the queue until it finds the one it needs.  If the second reference to be tested is found first it is simply discarded so the next call to checkRef will fail.  A new version of checkRef that takes an array should be created that will check both references at once.

Created an attachment (id=61976)
Fix

I decided to use two reference queues.
Patch applied.  Let's see how it works.
It works. The test passed during N20070327.
